mapper.insert: insert into system_base_const (cid, logic_code, module, key, value, desc, is_delete, create_time, modify_time, create_user_id, modify_user_id) values (#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update system_base_const set logic_code = #{logicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module = #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, key = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cid, logic_code, module, key, value, desc, is_delete, create_time, modify_time, create_user_id, modify_user_id from system_base_const where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
